publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-466 Patricia Ferguson: Vive L’Ecosse!—That the Parliament welcomes the stunning victory that Scotland’s national football team achieved against France in the European championship game on Wednesday 12 September 2007; congratulates Alex McLeish and the entire squad on this much deserved win; recognises the contribution of the Tartan Army in its ambassadorial role, and wishes the team every success in the remaining qualifying games. Supported by: Bill Butler*, Margaret Smith*, Jamie Stone*, Des McNulty*, Alex Johnstone*, Michael McMahon*, Mary Mulligan*, Mary Scanlon*, James Kelly*, Bill Aitken*, Angela Constance*, Elaine Murray*, Marlyn Glen*, Sarah Boyack*, Helen Eadie*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Tavish Scott*, Andy Kerr*, Murdo Fraser*, Trish Godman*, Hugh Henry*

S3M-466 Patricia Ferguson: Vive L’Ecosse!—That the Parliament welcomes the stunning victory that Scotland’s national football team achieved against France in the European championship game on Wednesday 12 September 2007; congratulates Alex McLeish and the entire squad on this much deserved win; recognises the contribution of the Tartan Army in its ambassadorial role, and wishes the team every success in the remaining qualifying games. Supported by: Bill Butler, Margaret Smith, Jamie Stone, Des McNulty, Alex Johnstone, Michael McMahon, Mary Mulligan, Mary Scanlon, James Kelly, Bill Aitken, Angela Constance, Elaine Murray, Marlyn Glen, Sarah Boyack, Helen Eadie, Hugh O’Donnell, Tavish Scott, Andy Kerr, Murdo Fraser, Trish Godman, Hugh Henry, Robin Harper*, Cathy Peattie*, Malcolm Chisholm*, Mike Pringle*, Karen Whitefield*, Mr Frank McAveety*
S3M-466 Vive L’Ecosse! (lodged on 13 September 2007) Pauline McNeill*, Jackie Baillie*, Elaine Smith*
S3M-466 Vive L’Ecosse! (lodged on 13 September 2007) Rhoda Grant*
S3M-466 Vive L’Ecosse! (lodged on 13 September 2007) Jack McConnell*
